attributes.action: Make it illegal to extend article 50 any further, Oct 31st is the day we leave
attributes.background: The UK voted to leave the EU in 2016, we have now been waiting for 3 years for parliament to enact it. Remain Politicians have blocked it in every possible way undemocratically .  We cannot afford to kick the can down the road any further as it just destroying the economy. The public have had enough
